casebody.data:
(Republished)

In the Matter of Hyman Kaufman, as Executor of Meyer Kaufman, Deceased. Hyman Kaufman, Respondent; Jacob Kaufman, Appellant; Louis J. Lefkowitz, as Attorney-General of the State of New York, et al., Respondents.

— Order, Surrogate’s Court, Bronx County, entered on March 31, 1978, unanimously affirmed on the opinion of Gelfand, S. Respondents Hyman Kaufman and Esther Kaufman shall recover of appellant one bill of $75 costs and disbursements of this appeal. No opinion. The order of this court entered on May 24, 1979 [70 AD2d 557] is vacated. Concur — Murphy, P. J., Sandler, Lane, Silverman and Yesawich, JJ.
